In his first comments about Roseanne 's Twitter tirade , President Donald Trump slammed [ARG0: the CEO of Disney] for [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: apologizing] [ARG2: to him] [ARGM-CAU: for horrible statements said on ABC] .
In his first comments about Roseanne 's Twitter tirade , President Donald Trump slammed the CEO of Disney for not apologizing to him for [ARG1: horrible statements] [V: said] [ARGM-LOC: on ABC] .
